card.name: Create a Machine
card.description: Choose a monster. Add a {{CARD:372|1}} to your hand with {{KW:TAUNT}} and set its base stats equal to the stats of the chosen monster.

description.now: Choose a monster. Add a {{CARD:372|1}} to your hand with {{KW:TAUNT}} and set its base stats equal to the stats of the chosen monster.
description.prev: Choose a monster on the board. Add a {{CARD:270|1}} with its {{COST}} and stats as base stats to your hand.
